tasks.task: Planting Atlantic dill giant pumpkin seeds
subtasks: Fill container with moist potting soil
Create a hole in the soil for the seed
Position seed with pointy end down
Ensure soil is moist but not overly compacted
Allow seeds to absorb water prior to planting

tasks.task: Care for seedlings in germination station
subtasks: Place containers on a heat mat (17 watts)
Provide ample light immediately upon seedling emergence
Monitor for first true leaf development

tasks.task: Transplant seedlings once true leaves are established
subtasks: Assess seedling health and environmental conditions
Transfer seedlings outdoors as soon as weather permits
Minimize shock by transplanting smaller seedlings
Position seedlings in the ground considering stem growth direction

tasks.task: Maintain vine direction for optimal growth
subtasks: Analyze first true leaf position to predict vine direction
Guide vine growth aligned with desired path
